children.text: Nearly every person in the U.S. will know someone who has been shot in their lifetime.
Everyone has a story to tell.
Through local and collaborative storytelling, we seek to inspire solutions and interrupt cycles of gun violence.

slides.altText: A person holds a sign with the word "ACTION".
slides.quote: I want my story to be heard.

slides.altText: A child swings on a swing-set at the playground.
slides.quote: My kids should feel safe at our neighborhood playground.

slides.altText: A locker in a school hallway has posted messages from grieving students.
slides.quote: My cousin was killed in a school shooting.

slides.altText: Empty student seats. One of the desks is shaped like a gun.
slides.quote: Practicing active shooter drills in school made me feel afraid and paranoid.
My son was killed in crossfire.
